alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale; Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 5:48PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lauderdale, northwestern Limestone, east central Colbert and north central Lawrence Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 548 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Killen, or 8 miles east of Florence, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, Rogersville, Killen, Lexington, Leighton, St. Florian, Anderson, Good Springs and Center Star. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
